description:
If you're after sunglasses that effortlessly blend style and functionality, these Ryders Eyewear Dalby Sunglasses might be the one. These sunglasses are a versatile evolution of the popular Serra frame, favored by athletes and outdoor enthusiasts.

  • The Dalby Sunglasses feature an enlarged and curved lens for enhanced vision, UV protection, and durability, thanks to impact-resistant and scratch-resistant polycarbonate
  • They're designed to transition seamlessly from athletic activities to casual outings, with a lightweight TR90 thermoplastic frame, rubber nose pads, and temple tips for a secure and comfortable fit
  • The lens also has an anti-fog coating that prevents condensation and a hydrophobic coating that repels water, oil, and dirt
  • These sunglasses are suitable for medium-large faces
name: Ryders Eyewear Dalby Sunglasses
